instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1286: What is A1286? A1286 is a model number for a 15 inch size MacBook Pro Unibody from years Late 2008, Mid 2009, Mid 2009 , Mid 2010, Early 2011, Late 2011, Mid 2012 with EMC 2255, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-2330, 820-2532, 820-2523, 820-2533, 820-2850, 820-2915, 820-3330..
definitions.820-2850: What is 820-2850? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.C9560: What is C9560? Tantalum capacitor on 820-2850 logic board that often dies and causes intermittent power to framebuffer PP1V8R1V55_S0GPU_ISNS and PP1V8R1V55_S0GPU_ISNS_R rail, causing GPU kernel panics. Replace with non-tantalum if machine is having random black screen or kernel panics.

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1286</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2850</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> black screen after 20 minutes roughly,CAP had been changed.
threads.message:
having this <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2850</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> board., it would turn off the video to black screen after around 20 minutes usage.
thought may have something to do with <CAPACITOR>C9560</CAPACITOR>, changed it ,(did this repair many times already for this model,so nothing wrong with the replacement)
but problem is still there . any one came across this ??

thank you

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1286</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2850</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> black screen after 20 minutes roughly,CAP had been changed.
threads.message: Probably a real dead GPU in this case.

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1286</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2850</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> black screen after 20 minutes roughly,CAP had been changed.
threads.message:
big chance on the GPU right? since I fixed problem with the MUX and VRAM also on this model.seems like everything is possible lol.
just want to get a hint before I replace all of them lol..
thanks Duke,i will just go ahead and replace the GPU then
